message.body: Have you read any good books lately?
I finished all my semester assignments early so essentially I don't have anything to do for the next month and now I'm looking for a book
Hey! So did you want to come to the Pollyanna we were planning? I wasn't sure if you were into the whole buying gifts for people you didn't know well.
No pressure. We always do our own thing anyway lol
Haha yes let's just do us :)
I thought so lol Charles was like "she fits right in!" And I was like hanging out is one thing. Buying gifts is a completely different thing
Well of course I fit in haha. I love everyone :) I say no just because I have no idea what anyone would want or is interested in.
Okay cool. I would love to hang out with your gang again soon
